title: Which course is better after doing a BSc? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you have a passion for pure science go further on for MSc.. If you want a job oriented course there are so many options such as nursing diplomas, law, microbiology, tourism related diplomas, administrative diplomas/degrees , journalism, event management, fashion designing, animation and SPL effects , etc Choose the best option which appeals to you and pursue such courses to find a life occupation.
You can do Msc ,Ph D and become college professor Other options are LLB ,MBA Bank Clerk ,Officer and IAS are other good options
